titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Greer Williams papers FA1791

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:19:04 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This small collection of Greer Williams's papers primarily concerns reactions to his article on "Quality versus Quantity in American Medical Education," which appeared in Science 153, no. 3739 (1966 August 26). Other materials consist of a draft of Williams's article on the Rockefeller Foundation, a book proposal, and various research notes. Apart from a few notes, most of these materials are unrelated to Williams's work on the RF's International Health Division (IHD).

Rockefeller Foundation staff separated these materials from the much larger collection of Williams's notes and manuscripts relating to the history of the IHD, which are found in the RF's Program and Policy records, SG 3.1, series 908.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Greer Williams's correspondence, notes, and manuscripts relating to his consultancy for the RF and his history of the International Health Board are found in the Rockefeller Foundation records, Program and Policy SG 3.1, series 908 International Health Board, under "History."

did.unittitle: The Rockefeller Foundation's Determined Optimists (First Draft)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Greer Williams article published as "The Rockefeller Foundation: How It Operates," Atlantic Monthly, 1964 April.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Letters to Williams and his responses, mainly concerning his article in Science on "Quality versus Quantity in American Medical Education."

did.unittitle: Reprint Requests, "Quality versus Quantity in American Medical Education"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes papers by Jacob Gershon-Cohen; exchange by R. W. Gerard and R. N. Hamburger; and other materials.

did.unittitle: International Health Division (IHD) History Research Support - Correspondence

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes Bibliography and list of source material for the IHD history.

did.unittitle: International Health Division (IHD) History - Bibliography Cards

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Reference file; catalogue cards arranged alphabetically by author and title.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous notes: Field Training Station in Alabama (Smillie); Comparison of Lethability of Uncinaria and Ankylostoma (Smillie); notes on jungle yellow fever (Norman Elton); Fred L. Soper comments on Williams's Malaria chapter, 1966; Johns Hopkins School of Public Health, 1960.
